metadata.title: CVE-2023-52444 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:fix to avoid dirent corruption As Al reported in link[1]: f2fs_rename() ...if (old_dir != new_dir && !whiteout) f2fs_set_link(old_inode,old_dir_entry, old_dir_page, new_dir); else f2fs_put_page(old_dir_page, 0);You want correct inumber in the ".." link. And cross-directory rename doesmove the source to new parent, even if you'd been asked to leave a whiteoutin the old place. [1]https://lore.kernel.org/all/20231017055040.GN800259@ZenIV/ With belowtestcase, it may cause dirent corruption, due to it missed to callf2fs_set_link() to update ".." link to new directory. - mkdir -p dir/foo -renameat2 -w dir/foo bar [ASSERT] (__chk_dots_dentries:1421) --> Bad inodenumber[0x4] for '..', parent parent ino is [0x3] [FSCK] other corruptedbugs [Fail]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic-64k - 6.8.0-11.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-aws - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-azure - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1002-gcp - 6.8.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-ibm - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-7-lowlatency - 6.8.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-oracle - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1001-raspi - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.8.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
